Posts.EditableText:
Please, play this. 
Don't give it a bad review. 
Let me know if something doesn't work and I will try to fix it. 

I think it is a pretty fantastic game, myself. 
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/3mw6lsyphuekytn8trj_fw/spine

I will be right back. It turns out I had a thing or two to fix, just little things. It will be back online tomorrow.

Posts.EditableText: The game is back online. I had copied and pasted a very lengthy text without editing it for the change in room names. If anything else is wrong let me know, but I think it is all set up, now. I added things to it up and down the day, today.
Posts.HTML: The game is back online. I had copied and pasted a very lengthy text without editing it for the change in room names. If anything else is wrong let me know, but I think it is all set up, now. I added things to it up and down the day, today.
